overseer.text: ? My surveillance systems in that room have been damaged.

option.text: Looks like a large solar panel cut into the floor of the room.
, be happy you can’t see this.
So you can’t see what I’m doing right now?

overseer.text: Yes, because having to depend on you to tell me what occurred is definitely more preferable.
Correct, so you can now do whatever ridiculous shenanigans you have been waiting to do without me seeing. I am glad to see you take advantage a situation even if it is a serious crisis.

arachne.text: It seems that a part of the satellite known as the Hubble Space Telescope has crashed into the

option.text: Any recommendations on what to do next?
How did this happen? Is nothing sacred?!

overseer.text: …The Hubble?...Well, that is interesting. It was supposed to have safety deorbited…very interesting.
I am genuinely as surprised as you are. This is…interesting.
The Hubble? Relatively speaking maybe. However, I am less concerned about its size and more concerned about what it is doing on your capsule. Do you know what happened to it?

arachne.text: I cannot be certain of what occurred to the satellite, though it seems it has cut through several internal components.
They seem to have already escaped.
Remain calm while I begin repairs on the hull.
